H0.text: In which country is the Mekong Delta. Thailand

H1.text: In which country is the Mekong Delta. Cambodia

H2.text: In which country is the Mekong Delta. Laos

H3.text: In which country is the Mekong Delta. SRVN

A4.text: The Mekong Delta is located in southwestern Vietnam.

A5.text: After 1975, the Mekong Delta ceased being a part of the Republic of Vietnam, succeeded by the current Vietnamese nation.
